bill.title: Municipal annexation; require approval by majority of electors in area to be annexed and in certain adjoining areas.
bill.description: An Act To Create Section 21-1-28, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require An Election On The Question Of Municipal Annexation In The Territory Proposed To Be Annexed And In Certain Adjoining Territory; To Require The Governing Authorities Of The Municipality To Annex The Proposed Territory And The Unincorporated Areas Of Both The Census Block Where The Territory Is Located And Any Census Block Adjoining That Territory If Approved By A Majority Vote Of Qualified Electors; To Amend Sections 21-1-27, 21-1-29, 21-1-31, 21-1-33, 21-1-35, 21-1-37 And 21-1-39, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Remove The Question Of Municipal Annexation From The Chancery Court; And For Related Purposes.
